issues.message: Remove the "_testDocument" field and declare it as a local variable in the relevant methods.
Remove the "_incrementalAnalyzer" field and declare it as a local variable in the relevant methods.
Remove the "_onAnalyzerException" field and declare it as a local variable in the relevant methods.
Remove the "_workspace" field and declare it as a local variable in the relevant methods.
Remove the "_disableCancellation" field and declare it as a local variable in the relevant methods.
